text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One morning during Tracen's summer<n>camp, I notice Mejiro
Ryan walking<n>toward me, stretching her arms.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Morning, Trainer! Looking forward to<n>another great workout!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, my engines are rearing to<n>go! Your training might
have<n>something to do with that. Ah, right,<n>the morning
meeting!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One after the other, trainees<n>congregate in the lobby of the
camp<n>dorm. The head trainer then steps<n>forward.

text_block_list.name: Head Trainer
text_block_list.text:
We've reached the halfway point of<n>the summer camp, and
I'm sure<n>you're starting to feel the effects of<n>your
training. No doubt you want to<n>test out your new skills.

text_block_list.name: Head Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Which is why we're holding<n>scrimmages on the last day of
the<n>camp! If you're interested, let your<n>trainers know, and
they will apply in<n>your stead!

text_block_list.name: Head Trainer
text_block_list.text: At the moment, we already have one<n>participant... Oguri Cap!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wait, you're telling me I could race<n>against Oguri?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I've had my eyes on Oguri ever<n>since she transferred
to this school.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't have a fancy family<n>name supporting her. She
gets by on<n>pure talent... She's the real deal.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Trainer... can you sign me up for the<n>scrimmages? I want to
race Oguri.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Thanks! I'll show her everything I've<n>got!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of which... we better come<n>up with a workout
routine if we wanna<n>beat Oguri!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Oguri's acceleration at the end of the<n>race is her secret
weapon. She's a<n>late surger, just like me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: But is it a good idea to stick to the<n>same strategy here?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Two strategies immediately come to<n>mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We could refine our current strategy<n>and face Oguri Cap
head-on. Or... we<n>could surprise her with a pace chaser<n>
strategy and try to get ahead of her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I relay these options to Mejiro Ryan<n>and tell her the choice
is hers. After<n>pondering for a while, she raises her<n>head.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I want to try the pace chaser strategy!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. Normally, I'd want to face her<n>head-on—make it a
battle of the<n>surgers. But I want to expand my<n>horizons
and try something new!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her eyes are full of conviction—even<n>more so than usual. I
can easily tell<n>how badly she wants to win this.
choice_data_list: All right, then pace chaser training it is!
All right, then pace chaser training it is!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Yeah, let's do this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Since our strategy requires keeping a<n>steady pace over a
long period, we<n>need to work on my stamina!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
A teensy bit of stamina training ain't<n>gonna take me down!
Come on,<n>muscles, lemme hear you cry out!<n>Your pain, my
gain!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Wheeze...
choice_data_list: All right, let's take a break.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Got it! Thanks!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: We don't have much time, but we<n>should be—huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just then, a sudden gust of wind hits<n>the two of us. In that
moment, I see a<n>white blur out of the corner of my<n>eye...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wait... Was that Oguri?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I'm sure of it! I'd never miss<n>that silvery hair of hers!
That sprint...<n>She must be training like crazy too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
...Good. I wouldn't wanna fight Oguri<n>if she wasn't gonna
give it her all.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Moved by Oguri Cap's determination,<n>Mejiro Ryan softly
smiles. As I stand<n>by her side, I notice a few trainees<n>
gossiping behind us.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hey... Was that Oguri? I thought she<n>was in a slump...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I bet that's why she's training<n>so hard.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A slump... Sounds like the pace<n>chaser strategy was the
right choice.<n>We can definitely catch her off guard<n>at this
rate.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
It was just for a moment, but I caught<n>a glimpse of Oguri's
face when she<n>ran by. She looked so determined. No<n>way
could you call that a slump.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
When you're prepping for a big race,<n>you've gotta believe
you can do it.<n>Otherwise, there's no way you could<n>run
like that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Believing in yourself... In that case...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the scrimmage arrives,<n>and from what I can tell,
Oguri Cap is<n>in tip-top shape, just like Mejiro<n>Ryan
predicted.

text_block_list.name: Head Trainer
text_block_list.text: All right, racers, get into position.<n>Ready, set... go!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Oguri, I've always looked up to you,<n>but now... I'm gonna
surpass you!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Oguri's in a great position! Ah, but so<n>is Ryan! Ohhh... I can't
wait to see the<n>final dash for the finish line!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: This is me... This is how MejiroRyan runs!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Oguri's pulled ahead, but Ryan's not<n>far behind! They're
doing it! They're<n>facing each other head-on!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: They're neck and neck! Who will<n>win?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Rats. Thought I had her there,<n>but she beat me good.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for changing our strategy<n>midway through... Seeing
Oguri take<n>her training so seriously made me<n>want to take
her on as a surger.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
You bet! That race was so intense! If I<n>had just been a
liiiittle bit faster, I bet I<n>could've won!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I'm disappointed, sure, but I'm not<n>sad at all. If anything,
I'm proud of<n>myself for doing things my way!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I want to get stronger—strong enough<n>that I won't lose to
Oguri Cap or<n>Mejiro McQueen ever again!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Trainer... Will you... help me get there?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan shows me the brightest<n>smile I've ever seen.
In that moment,<n>my conviction to make her dreams<n>come
true grows even stronger.
